text: Please read the consent form below and choose to consent or not to consent to include your survey responses as anonymous data in a research study seeking to improve writing instruction.  Whether or not you consent, your tasks are exactly the same, you will receive credit (if applicable), and your teacher (if applicable) will never know your decision.  If you select “Yes,” it means you have read or have had read to you the consent form below, and you agree to include your responses as anonymous study data.
